Data Attribute Reference

Required Data Attributes

  • data-step-id - Unique identifier for progress tracking
  • data-tags - Comma-separated tags for filtering
  • data-category - Primary category for organization
  • data-pokemon - Pokemon name (lowercase, no spaces)
  • data-pokemon-id - National Pokedex number
  • data-location - Location identifier
  • data-trainer - Trainer name (lowercase, hyphenated)
  • data-field - Field name for data storage

Accessibility Attributes

  • aria-label - Descriptive label
  • aria-labelledby - Reference to labeling element
  • aria-describedby - Reference to description
  • aria-expanded - For collapsible elements
  • aria-hidden - For decorative elements
  • role - ARIA role when semantic HTML isn't sufficient

These HTML templates demonstrate semantic markup, accessibility best practices, and consistent data structure for the Pokemon Walkthrough Project. All templates integrate with the CSS architecture and JavaScript modules for complete functionality.
